Unnamed: 2: User

Unnamed: 9: Well, maybe try narrowing your search criteria then? Instead of just searching for "civil rights movement," try adding in specific keywords like "freedom riders" or "desegregation." That way you'll get results that are more relevant to what you're looking for.
